page.title: 19A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: To my dissapointment I find the school open,with kids screaming in the playground,the bell then goes for registration,and I tumble in with the rest of the crowd. After assembly we have two lessons,they go as smooth as a rock-cake.After that follows a quarter of an hour breather,a space between lessons called break. After third lesson comes dinner,I queue up in the sandwich line,and go up to the library to read books all dinnertime. When the bell goes I'm off home,I arrive tired and worn out.I start to relax in my armchair then "Get changed" my mum bellows out. I start then doing my homework,it begins straight after tea,then spend the rest of the evening,sitting down and watching T.V.
